title: Capping the Divisional Round
description:
Laura, Mina, RC, Dan, and Marcus review the Divisional Round of the playoffs which included four epic games that came down to game-winning field goals and a legendary overtime battle.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
